about_the_game:
The End of lines Original Soundtrack features 1h50 of music intertwined with ambient sounds created exclusively for the game.

Audio files will be placed in your End of Lines folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\EndOfLines\Soundtrack

Personnel:


Claire Sciacco — Violin, Viola,
Elisa Redondo — Flugelhorn,
Eva Drouin — Vocals,
Camille Marcos — Bass Clarinet,
Julien Ponsoda — Guitar, Vocals.

Synths, programming, additional vocals & instruments by Camille Marcos & Julien Ponsoda.

The End of Lines Original Soundtrack was composed and arranged by Camille Marcos and Julien Ponsoda (Illustrason).

The album was recorded, mixed, and mastered by Illustrason in Bordeaux in 2023, and published by Nova-box.
